CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Codes and Standards"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Price"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Product Delivery"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Relationship"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Specifications"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Other"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - No Steel"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Lead Time"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Mill Min Req"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Credit App"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost - Mill Prod"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Declined to Bid")), 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Oppty Lost
